title: Buttons

properties.name: description
properties.value: Buttons can be dropped by H.A.M Guards, thieved from H.A.M. Members in the H.A.M. Hideout behind the Lumbridge General Store, earned from the Fishing Trawler minigame, dug up at the Digsite, or obtained from Ogre Coffins. You will need at least 15 Thieving to be able to thieve female H.A.M. Members and 20 Thieving for male H.A.M. Members. They require level 3 Crafting to polish, yielding 5 Crafting experience and results in the message: "You rub the buttons on your clothes and they become more shiny." This changes them into polished buttons, which are used in Animal Magnetism.

Buttons
Released9 July 2003 (Update)

Quest itemAnimal Magnetism

Weight0.001 kg
Advanced data
Item ID688

Buttons can be dropped by H.A.M Guards, thieved from H.A.M. Members in the H.A.M. Hideout behind the Lumbridge General Store, earned from the Fishing Trawler minigame, dug up at the Digsite, or obtained from Ogre Coffins. You will need at least 15 Thieving to be able to thieve female H.A.M. Members and 20 Thieving for male H.A.M. Members. They require level 3 Crafting to polish, yielding 5 Crafting experience and results in the message: "You rub the buttons on your clothes and they become more shiny." This changes them into polished buttons, which are used in Animal Magnetism.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
12 December 2006
(update)

The "Polish" option was added.

5 July –
19 September 2005

The item's examine was changed from "Not Dick Whittingtons' helper at all!"[sic] to "Not Dick Whittington's helper at all!".

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The examine text refers to a pantomime character based on the real-life Richard Whittington.
